basics.label: Administrative Specialist/Office Manager
basics.summary: An administrative specialist with outstanding customer service skills and technological proficiency. Proficient in various softwares including Microsoft Office Suite, Quatro Pro, Peachtree Accounting, Timeslips 2007, Dictation, ITI Banking Software.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Answered a high volume of incoming calls in a national call center from current and prospective customers as well as sales associates. Administered device-related troubleshooting, kept records of customer interactions, and maintained knowledge on changing services and products.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared legal documents and performed accounting duties. Greeted clients and scheduled appointments.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked directly with the President and the Chief Financial Officer to schedule, plan meetings and events, and booked travel arrangements.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided customer service, assisting customers with account inquiries. Handled account opening, problem-solving and financial product cross-selling.
